ygData.subject: EQ players
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I have recently set up a new forum site. It s a board that will focus on discussions of the various MMORPGs that are out there. Obviously, I m in
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
I have recently set up a new forum site. It's a board that will focus
on discussions of the various MMORPGs that are out there.
Obviously, I'm in need of some posters and I am very ungraciously
(perhaps even a little spamishly) asking for anyone and everyone to
come by and post your thoughts.

If you love your game, please tell the world about it. Tell us why EQ
is better than Ultima Online or Asheron's Call. Discuss that rule
change that you always wanted. Tell the world how you kick major ass.

Site is at http://www.bigonlinegames.com/

Thanks,
Michael Lutter
